name: Pet Runner Subway
description:
Pet Runner Subway is a free pets runner game with subway running theme. Select lovely cats and start your dash adventure in subway.
You cat have many pretty actions like run, slide, jump, roll and dodge trains. Start your way, run as fast as you can to escape from tom. Collect as much coins as possible to buy more interesting items in shop.
How to play:
+ Swipe left to turn left
+ Swipe right to turn right
+ Swipe back to slide
+ Swipe forward to jump
+ Double tap to use skateboard
